intro_text: p_l sees weird ripples on the water of the underground spring while collecting fresh water.
decline_text: p_l is in a hurry and does not stop to look at the ripples.

success_text.unscathed_common: As p_l looks into the water of the underground spring {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/are/is} greeted by an intense vision. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/drop/drops} what {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/are/is} doing and race back to the camp to tell and consult with {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} leader.
success_text.unscathed_rare: {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/are/is} greeted with the vision of a cat {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} had failed to save looking content and happy in StarClan, saying that {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/were/was} not at fault for their death. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/feel/feels} unburdened and at peace after receiving that vision.

fail_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/gaze/gazes} into the water of the underground spring only to see the weird ripples were caused by a small fish flopping around. p_l feels disappointed because {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} really could have used some guidance from StarClan.

intro_text: p_l decides it's a good opportunity to show app1 where the most commonly needed herbs are in the territory, both above and underground away from the hot sun.
decline_text: As {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/see/sees} app1's absent minded gaze, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/change/changes} {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} mind. Maybe another day, when app1 is more focused and less liable to get a heatstroke when they go to show {PRONOUN/app1/object} the herbs aboveground

success_text.unscathed_common: app1 is focused and attentive. p_l is confident that next time there is an emergency, app1 will be able to find those herbs both under and above ground without {PRONOUN/p_l/object} if needed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: As p_l is explaining why and where the herbs are growing, app1 lets out a shout. To p_l's surprise, {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/have/has} found a previously unknown patch of an uncommon herb. Stunned and filled with pride that {PRONOUN/app1/subject} found and recognized the herb, p_l promises {PRONOUN/app1/object} the first pick of fresh-kill.

fail_text.unscathed_common: app1 is constantly distracted and running ahead much to the frustration of p_l. Evidently no new knowledge will be learned that day.

intro_text: app1 has been sent out into the desert to try to find some specific herbs alone.
decline_text: Nervous and with the hot sun pounding on {PRONOUN/app1/poss} back, {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/decides} to go back to camp and try again another day, {PRONOUN/app1/poss} tail dragging behind {PRONOUN/app1/object}.

success_text.unscathed_common: app1 is focused and determined to prove {PRONOUN/app1/poss} independence. {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} {VERB/app1/find/finds} the herbs easily, and bring them back to camp with {PRONOUN/app1/poss} head held up high, no sweat, no stress, no fuss.
success_text.unscathed_rare: app1 goes to a known herb patch - but the plant has died! {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} {VERB/app1/do/does}n't give up, hunting around in the area until {PRONOUN/app1/subject} find a smaller overlooked patch that still has leaves on it.

fail_text.unscathed_common: app1 goes to a known herb patch - but the plant has died! {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} give up and return to camp, feeling terrible.

intro_text: p_l, fueled by desperation and unable to leave the Clan because of the heat of greenleaf withering c_n, ingests a piece of sacred cacti hoping to trigger a vision.
decline_text: At that exact moment a cat walks into the medicine cat den looking for p_l. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/put/puts} the piece of cacti back, having to wait for a better time.

success_text.unscathed_common: Guided by the visions and dreams sent by StarClan, images of the suffering of greenleaf and the hope for new life flash before {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} eyes. p_l awakes relieved and determined. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/know/knows} now what actions {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} should take to save c_n

fail_text.unscathed_common: p_l wakes up confused and unable to remember if {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} have communicated with StarClan. The only thought bouncing around in {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} head for some reason is the word quenchy. Frustrated, p_l realizes that StarClan won't help {PRONOUN/p_l/object} this time.
fail_text.death: r_c has an unexpected severe reaction to the cacti, {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} throat swelling shut in seconds. Unable to call for help, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} fade away toward StarClan. c_n will have to mourn one more cat.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died trying to communicate with StarClan using a rare and dangerous ritual in an attempt to save {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clan.

intro_text: p_l and app1 head out for lungwort, with p_l starting a lesson on the value of this rare herb for treating yellowcough.
decline_text: A cat grabs p_l's attention before they can leave. Sighing, the expedition is delayed for another time.

success_text.unscathed_common: It takes them all day, but eventually, finally, p_l spots the speckled leaves they've been looking for, so crucial to harvest before the plants die back inthe withering heat of greenleaf. For just a second, p_l feels the weight of {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} responsibilities lift, and {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/let/lets} out a whoop and stop to play with app1.
success_text.unscathed_rare: app1 listens intently as the hours drift slowly by in their intense search, and then finally spots a bush with leaves sprinkled with white. It's lungwort! p_l showers {PRONOUN/app1/object} with praise, app1 feeling like {PRONOUN/app1/subject} could burst with accomplishment.
success_text.stat_skill: It takes all of s_c's considerable talent for such things to hunt down the lungwort within their borders, the medicine cats visiting each likely nook and cranny in a carefully planned search pattern until finally those telltale speckled leaves are found.
success_text.stat_trait: Night falls, and still s_c insists they keep going - lungwort is the only reliable cure for yellowcough, they can't let c_n go without. Exhausted but determined, the medicine cats persist patiently until they find those precious speckled leaves.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Not only do they not find anything, app1 seems to take in absolutely nothing of what p_l is teaching {PRONOUN/app1/object}, and by the time they're back at camp, p_l wants to scream.

intro_text: p_l while searching for some specific herbs is startled by weird sounds and whispers on the wind.
decline_text: Unnerved and unable to discern if it is a sign from StarClan or nothing, they go back to c_n to ask for help and guidance.

success_text.unscathed_common: p_l, sure that it is a sign of StarClan, follows the sounds and whispers on the wind and finds a queen who lost their life in a harsh kitting, their newborn kits clinging to a body that will never move again. p_l instantly wraps {PRONOUN/p_l/self} around the kits and orders r_c back to camp to find help and a queen willing to nurse them.
success_text.unscathed_rare: p_l follows the strange sounds on the wind and finds a struggling queen with their newborn kits clinging to them. r_c sprints back to camp to get help while p_l tries to make the queen eat some strengthening herbs. Thankful for the help, the queen joins c_n with their kits.

fail_text.unscathed_common: p_l follows the strange sounds on the wind and finds the bodies of an unknown queen with their kits slowly going cold. r_c goes back to camp to get help to bring their bodies back to camp to pay respects and bury them.

intro_text: p_l goes out with a warrior escort, both for safety as they look for newleaf's fresh buds, and for carrying capacity should they find anything.

fail_text.unscathed_common: It's an exhausting day. p_l starts chatting with r_c to pass the time, but they have nothing in common and the other cat bluntly refuses to talk about boring herbs.
